entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload --source looks for bad semver if you provide a faulty URL #29078
  • `dotnet tool install -a arm64` fails on linux-arm64 #29074
  • 50x slower build with .net 6.0.403 compared to 6.0.402 #29071
  • Add dotnet7 in Ubuntu 22.04 jammy repository #29069
  • manpages should live in installer repo so they are included in .deb, .rpm, .tar.gz and macOS .pkg #29067

Closed

  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993
  • Shared resources (resx) does not work in .net core 3.1 and VS 16.4 #4033
  • Unable to install .NET 7 on Ubuntu 22.04.1 on WSL #28995
  • dotnet nuget update source has user unfriendly behaviour #29026
  • Workloads: Feed authentication during install doesn't seem to work at all on macOS #25458
    7.0.2xx
  • dotnet test doesn't respect platform override anymore #29076
  • Latest VS2022 Preview update breaks everything #29037
  • Razor build server (process 27970) failed to shut down: The shutdown command failed: The application to execute does not exist #10573
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] fixed dotnet/templating#5600 "No templates found" when required parameter is missing #29070
    Servicing-approved, Area-dotnet new, 7.0.1xx
  • Fix typo in WebSocketScriptInjection.js #29073
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TargetPlatformVersion normalization for Windows #29009
    Servicing-rejected
  • Clean up Razor Server pid file if the path doesn't exist #29029
    Area-CLI
  • fixed error reporting #29068
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29027
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2045591 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. (#28380) #29052
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update man pages post 7.0 GA #29032
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
